Reader’s choice
1.content:
Today was a typical morning at the Harper residence. You had just woken up and were still in your pajamas as you headed to the living room. You used to share a bed with your mom due to her being paranoid about your condition, but you were allowed to sleep in your own room last year a couple months after you got sick. You weren’t sure why this was, but after a few years of waking up squished under your mom, you weren’t going to question it. You saw that your mom hadn’t woken up yet, so you headed into the living room to watch TV. You hopped on the couch and crossed your legs and turned the channel to watch cartoons, but your show was interrupted as a familiar looking butt came into view and quickly crashed into you with a loud *SQUELCH*!


“Oh hey there, Jackie”, said an equally familiar voice. You had forgotten that your bully of an older cousin, Kat, was staying the week at your house. You always dreaded her visits, and the times you spent at your aunt’s house because of her, spending more time squished under her rear end or used in one of her mean pranks than you care to remember.
You let out muffled groans as she ground her bubble butt into your malleable form. “Didn’t see you there, little cousin. ‘Preciate you giving me something nice and comfy to sit on while I watch wrestling, though”, Kat said, laughing as she put her full weight on top of you.

You struggled as much as you could to squirm out from underneath her, but any progress you made was put to a stop as she bounced her butt. You soon heard a yawning from the hallway. Though it was muffled beneath your cousin’s butt cheeks, you knew that your mother had just woken up.


“Morning Aunt Trish”, Kat said as she waved over to your mom.


“*yawn* Good morning, Kat”, she groaned as she stretched. “Is Jack up yet?”


Kat shook her head. “Don’t think so. Little guy’s probably sleeping in.”

You tried to get your mother’s attention, crying out as loud as you could and wriggling hard.


“Kat, honey, what’s that noise?”, Trish asked as she walked into the living room. Your muffled shouting and your struggles were made more clear as she got closer to your cousin and she soon realized where you were. “Kat! Stop sitting on your cousin!”, Trish yelled.


“Huh? Oops!”, Kat said, feigning ignorance as she lifted her rump off of you, revealing your squished up body, molded into a crater the shape of her butt. “Sorry about that, Jackie!”


It didn’t take long for your body to retain it’s human shape, and you quickly shot an angry look at Kat. “Jack, don’t give your cousin that look”, your mother said. “She said she was sorry.”


You sighed, knowing Kat’s acting would get your mom to believe anything she said. “It’s okay, Kat”, you said with a hint of resentment.


“You need to be more careful, Katrina”, your mom said as she bent down and gave you a kiss on the forehead. “Good morning sweetie”, she said.


“Morning, momma.” You tried to grab the remote to change the channel, but it was quickly snatched out of your hand while the channel flipped to My Little Pony. "Hey! I was gonna watch something!", you cried as you reached for the remote, but it was quickly pulled out of your reach.

"Well you got to watch TV already, so it's my turn!" It was your little sister, Selena. Your mother had always wanted a daughter, and she had an extra room that wasn't being used, so Miss Barbara convinced her to adopt this specific little girl due to her having the same condition as yourself. Not only did that make you feel less special, but that meant you now had to share your mother, your home, and everything you owned. (Well, not everything, but it certainly felt that way.) It may have been selfish, but you were only ever used to sharing with your best friend, Andrew. Now you were forced to let some creepy girl who you had next to nothing in common with.

"I didn't even get to watch it!", you whined. "I was stuck under Kat's big butt, now gimme!" You reached for the remote from Selena while your cousin laughed at the two of you.

"MOOOOMMMMMYYY! JACK'S BEING GREEDY WITH THE TV!", Selena cried, kicking at you while you tried to grab at the remote. You almost grabbed it back before your mother took it, glaring angrily at the three of you.

"Jackson Scott Harper!", she scolded. "What have I told you about fighting with your sister?!"

"B-but Momma! She took-"

"If you have a problem, you come talk to me! You do NOT try to confront her!" She then turned her attention to Selena, who had stuck her tongue out at you, but her grin quickly disappeared. "Selena, I've told you not to antagonize your brother!"

"But My Little Pony's on, Mommy", she whined. "And Jack already got to watch his-"

"Tell him you want to watch something else, then come to me if he's being ugly about it", your mother sighed before turning her attention to Kat. "Why didn't you intervene? You saw them fighting and you just sat there and did nothing."

"Well... I wasn't sure what to do", Kat lied, having enjoyed the two of you squabbling.

Your mother shook her head and knelt down to both yours and Selena's level. "Both of you apologize and hug it out."

You pouted before looking up at your sister. "Sorry for being greedy, Selena."

"...Sorry for being impatient, Jack..." Selena gave you a hug, and you went to hug her back, only to be surprised by a sudden "mew", and jumped back in shock. It was your sister's pet cat, Ian. You were never allowed to have pets due to your condition, so it frustrated you when your mother allowed your little sister to keep this chubby black and red kitty. She said that he was the family's pet, but Selena seems to be the only one he likes. Too many times you've found yourself gurgling away in his tummy.
On top of that, he was able to turn anyone he bit squishy like yourself, and he seemed to target Andrew most of all.

Your sister quickly turned around and her face lit up. "Ian!" She quickly grabbed Ian and picked him up, giving her precious kitty a big hug. Ian purred in your sister's arms as she went to the kitchen.

Satisfied that you had made up with Selena, your mother followed to make breakfast for you, your sister, and your cousin. After eating, the four of you started getting ready for the day ahead.


What will you be doing today?
1.title: It's a New Day (yes it is)

You're at the wrong staircase.
You find yourself in the Jr. High section.

11.content:
As soon as you got dressed, you ran out to the bus stop, where Andrew was already waiting for you. "Yoooooo!", he shouted as he waved over to you.
"Hi Andrew", you greeted as you pulled your rolling backpack along.
Andrew handed over a toy robot. "Thanks for letting me borrow your Hot Rod", the boy said.
"It's okay." You got your toy from him, only to discover a piece was missing. "Uh, Andrew?", You asked. "What happened to his titanmaster?"
"The what?"
"Firedrive? His titanmaster? The little robot that turns into his head?"
Andrew laughed nervously and rubbed his neck. "Oh, uh... I was kinda... hoping you wouldn't notice..."
You let out a disappointed sigh. "Stevie?"
"Uh... yeah..." The one thing you were more worried about than Andrew's little brother getting ahold of you was him getting his little hands on your toys. Any time he touched one, at least a piece of it was going in his mouth. That was a reason why Andrew locked his own toys in a chest and sometimes asked to borrow your own. "I'm really sorry, Jack."
"*sigh* It's fine.Extras are pretty cheap..." You unzipped your backpack and put your toy away. "Just be more careful with them next time, okay?"
Andrew gave you a hug, squeezing you tightly as you were squished in his grip. "Thanks for being so cool with it! I promise i'll- oops!" Your friend led go as he felt your body start to flatten into his chest.

It didn't take long for the indention Andrew had made to fill back in. "Least I didn't get totally squished this time. Hehe."
You waved over as your mother drove off with Kat and Selena. On reason you preferred the bus was that your mom embarrassed you in front of other kids, as her overprotective nature would often earn you a day or two worth of teasing. On top of that, she always made you stay close by your sister, at least until you got inside. She'd always whine or try to call your mom if you tried to pull her along with you or left her alone, so you always had to follow her around when she talked to her friends. You enjoyed the safety of her car, but you didn't think it was worth getting picked on by the other kids.
"Hey, you've been taking the bus a lot lately. Is that because of your new sister?", Andrew asked.
You pouted as you groaned. "Yeah", you answered. "She's such a whiny butthead. I tried to get along with her like my mom wanted, but she's become such a brat. Then there's that dumb cat of hers..."
"That's kinda mean", Andrew said. You cringed a bit as you could hear some disappointment in his voice. "I mean, she was an orphan before your mom adopted her. I mean, yeah, she's kind of annoying sometimes, but she's probably just acting how she thinks little sisters are supposed to act."
"Yeah... But you gotta admit, that cat is a real pain."
Andrew cringed a bit. "Yeah... i really don't wanna get bit again..." Andrew had been bitten by your sister's cat once before and was made squishy just like you. He thought it was cool at first, but soon realized just how bad you have it thanks to his little brother.

The school bus soon arrived to pick you and Andrew up. He followed close behind you, keeping other kids from trying to snatch you up or pinch parts of you off. It wasn't too long ago, when Andrew was sick at home, that one girl yanked you from your seat and spent the trip on the way to school munching on you. She got to skip breakfast, but you missed half the school day moving along her digestive system and had to explain to the principal why you had been found naked in the girl's bathroom. You found an empty seat, but it was half-occupied by another kid. "Hey gummy kid, you can share a seat with me", the boy said, licking his lips.

"Uh, n-no thanks." You went back further, only to find more students in half-empty seats taunting you. Finally, you got to the back of the bus.
"Don't worry, I got this", Andrew said.
You weren't sure what he meant, but you sat down in the lone bus seat, trusting your friend. You would soon find that your trust was misplaced, as he quickly jumped on top of you, squishing you beneath his butt! *SQUELCH!* "See? I told you i got it", he said as he wriggled his rump on top of you. "No one's getting their hands on my buddy now."
You could hear the muffled giggling of the other kids, mixed in with some disappointed groans. You weren't exactly happy with being sat on for the second time today, but at least with Andrew you knew you would be getting to school safely. "It could be worse...", you thought, letting out a silent groan as the bus drove off to the school. It wouldn't be long before you reached it, but you would have to wait a little longer before Andrew stood up, as he chose to wait until everyone else had left.
"Sorry about that, buddy", Andrew said as he stood up, leaving you as just a butt print on the seat. He helped peel you off and watched as you reformed. "It sucks that we're the last stop for this bus."
"You're telling me", you sighed.

Andrew followed you out of the bus and you headed to the cafeteria to wait for the first bell to ring, passing briefly by the high school section and the weird staircase. You always saw smoke coming from those stairs and these kids in black going in and out. It always scared you to walk by there. You and Andrew called it the smoking staircase. As you neared the cafeteria, you stopped dead in your tracks your attention was immediately caught by someone. Time seemed to stand still as you caught sight of a new student, a young blonde girl just about your age. Your eyes went wide and your cheeks flush as you were certain that you had found the most beautiful girl in the world. Your stupor was soon put to a halt as Andrew snapped his fingers in front of your face.

"Hellooooo! What's the matter with you?", Andrew called.
"H-what?!" You shook your head as you came back to your senses. "S-sorry. I just..."
"Were you looking at the new girl?", Andrew blurted out, causing some of the kids around to laugh.
"Andrewww!", you whispered, trying to shush him up.
"What? Do you like her or something?", he asked as he looked over to her. "She is really pretty. I can see why you'd like her. I mean, I think I do. I don't like girls much..."
"Can you please keep it down?!", you asked. "I don't want her to think I'm... uh, where'd she go?" You looked around but the girl seemed to have vanished.
"She's probably being shown to her class room." You soon heard the bell ring to signal the start of school. "Looks like we need to head to class, too, buddy."
You sighed and began to make your way to Miss Carioca's class. You considered her to be a fairly nice teacher. You always did pretty well on her assignments and never really had a problem with her.
Class was the last thing on your mind at the moment, though. For some reason, you couldn't stop thinking about that girl. There just was something about her. You felt like you had to see her again. The only problem was you had no idea who's class she was in. "Uh, hey, Andrew? Could you do me a favor?"
"What's up?"
"Can you... Could you take my backpack to class? I have to use the bathroom, and you know how Miss Carioca is with going before class."
"Yeah, if we get our stuff in before we go, we get an extra five minutes before we're tardy", Andrew said as he took your backpack. "I got it for ya, but be careful. I can't leave class until she counts everyone's name."

"Thanks, Andrew", you said as you ran off. You didn't want to tell him the real reason for wanting to leave, but you didn't want him blurting it out to everyone. It wouldn't be long before the second bell rang and class started, and you only had five minutes after that. Everyone was too busy trying to get to class to bother with you, so you were pretty safe for now... or so you thought. As you turned the corner, you immediately made contact with a teenager, smacking right into their denim-clad butt before falling back and onto your own squishy butt. Almost as soon as you fell, your vision was blocked by the descending rump of the teen as it reduced you to a pancake! You mentally screamed for Andrew's help, but he couldn't hear you from your place stuck beneath the plump behind of the high-schooler. Even as they got up, you were still stuck, feeling every wobble and jiggle of the booty as they walked. Fortune would soon smile upon you as the teenager you were stuck to suddenly stopped and peeled you off. You mentally gulped as you were brought face to face with them and recognized them. It was your cousin, Kris, smirking as he looked down at you with the usual sleepy look in his eyes.

"I thought I felt something squishy cushion my fall", Kris said as he licked his lips. "You know, I didn't eat breakfast this morning. And a pancake does sound tasty right about now..."
You panicked as he began to raise you up near his open mouth, but your fears quickly subsided when he began laughing. "I'm only joking, Jackie!", he snickered. "I would never mess with my little cousin at school."
He set you on the floor and crouched down as he watched you reform. "It really is amazing how your body's able to restore itself... but we both really need to be getting to class."
"Y-yeah, sure, Kris..."

He waved back to you and headed over to his own class room... which made you realize that you were now in the high school section of the school, on the third floor! Regardless of which class room you were heading to, you only had a short amount of time to get there! Without thinking of where you were, you ran as fast as you could to the nearest staircase, hoping like hell that you could beat the clock...

111.content: You run as fast as you can and barely manage to keep yourself balanced as you almost tumble down the stairs. From an outsider's perspective it probably looked cartoony and desperate, but whatever it took to beat the clock. Finally, you reach the hallway of your classroom as the seconds tick by. You're pretty sure you hear Miss Carioca's voice reading out names but it might just be your imagination.

Class goes by smoothly. Time for recess.

1111.content:
You sighed in relief as you made it to your classroom. The door was still open, which was a good sign, though you were worried when you saw Andrew standing in the doorway with a worried look on his face. "Jack...", he said grimly as you walked over to him.

"What's wrong?", you asked him, a feeling of dread beginning to fill your mind. "I made it on time, didn't I?"

Andrew slowly shook his head. "You were too late. We both got detention for the rest of the year..."

"Wh-what?", you stammered. "But this is the first time I was late! And it wasn't even by that mu-" You were interrupted as Andrew started snickering.

"Haha! Gotcha, Jack!", he laughed.

You scowled a bit and lightly punched him on the arm, which he just laughed off. "Don't do that!", you whined. "I was freaking out the whole time over here!"

"Sorry", Andrew said. "Ms. Carioca's running late, so you're fine. What took you so long to get back? Did you get to see that girl?"

You groaned as you shook your head. "No... Kris fell on top of me and I spend the whole time stuck to his butt."

"Aww... well, there's always next time." Andrew patted your back as the two of you walked inside. You were more than a little disappointed that you weren't able to see Marilyn. You wanted badly to talk to her. But every time you tried, something bad happened to you. Either a teacher would fall on top of you, a door would slam into you, or you'd run into a bully. There was one brown-haired boy in particular you'd often come across when you tried to follow her, and he'd always figure out the meanest ways to torment you. He once squished you into a little ball and stuck you up his nose, leaving you up there covered in his snot for the rest of the day until he sneezed you into a tissue. You were lucky to not have run into him today.

You both soon found your assigned seats (unfortunately, on opposite ends of the room) and sat until your teacher arrived. Once she walked through the door, you were immediately made aware of her presence by the jingling of her jewelry. Miss Julia Carioca was a tall Brazilian woman with an accent as thick as her figure. She had wide hips and a butt that jiggled like a plate of gelatin with each step, made all the more noticeable by tight dress she's currently wearing. Her breasts, while not huge, were still quite impressive, easily bigger than your mother's. She had a bit of pudge on her belly, which wasn't well hidden, but everyone still agreed she was one of the prettiest teachers in the school. Her wavy, shoulder-length hair was jet black with blonde highlights. Her skin was dark, only a few shades off from you and your mother.
While she was very sweet, there was one problem you had with her. She isn't aware of your condition, or rather, she doesn't believe you have a condition. Miss Carioca is under the impression that you're playing a game, and assumes that you're just being silly when you're telling her about any incidents. Even if she's sat on you herself, she just assumes you've followed her whenever you finally peel off and reform.

"Good morning, childran", Miss Carioca greeted. "Sorry I late today. But is going to be easy day, no worry." As the teacher took role call, you prayed that she was right. You've already had a pretty bad start, ending up getting squashed by three people already. Hopefully this would be an uneventful day...
1111.title: Time for Class

11113.content:
Shortly after Miss Carioca called the last of the students names, her phone started ringing. She took a look at it and sighed. "Oh crud... sorry, childran, I haff to take this. I don't take too long", she assured her students as she exited the room. As soon as she left, the other kids got up and started talking to their friends. You were about to do the same, but you were quickly pushed back down in your seat. When you looked up, you gulped in fear as you saw a well-dressed girl standing before you with an evil grin on her face, though the two girls that she was usually with with didn't seem to be present. It was Elise Courthouse, one of your worst enemies. She came from a very rich family and saw everyone as being beneath her, and saw you as little more than a toy to amuse herself with. Elise had been responsible for much of your misfortunes in school.

"Oh hello little Squish Boy", she said smugly, knowing full well you had no way to defend yourself. You looked over to Andrew hoping he would be able to help you, but instead you found him distracted by Elise's two friends, nervously talking to them as they pretended to swoon over him. You gulped just before the rich little brat grabbed your head and squished you down into the seat before she picked up your half-flattened body and squished up your flailing legs.
"You know, I thought I was going to be bored today since you were late coming in", Elise said to you as she squished and stretched your body, ignoring your muffled cries for help. "Lucky the teacher's phone went off so we could play. I think Miss Carioca deserves a nice comfy seat, don't you, Squish Boy?", she giggled. Completely unnoticed by the rest of the class, Elise walked you up to Miss Carioca's chair and continued molding you until you were nothing but a black and brown ball with a pair of eyes before she pressed you face-first into the seat, your black hair perfectly camouflaging you against the black leather cushioning. Once she was certain that you weren't going anywhere, she smirked down at you before signaling to her friends, who soon left Andrew alone. He sighed in relief, as he was really nervous around girls, but he unfortunately didn't have time to check on you before the teacher returned.

"Sorry childran", Miss Carioca said as she walked over to her desk. "That take longer than I thought. Since we have test yesterday, we just watch a video." As the class cheered, you were unable to see the danger before you. A bright red skirt struggled to contain Miss Carioca's bronze squishy moons as they slowly descended. As she lowered herself, her skirt slid up and she sat her full weight on top of you, the chair making a creaking sound. You could feel any air inside you being forced out as the Brazilian teacher's plump booty crushed the life out of you. You wanted to scream, but any noise you made was muffled by the leather of the chair. As she wore a thong beneath her dress, your poor body was being pressed right up against her bare flesh. "Andrew, will you turn the lights off?", she asked as she shifted her booty on top of you. The boy nodded and went up to flip the switch, failing to notice that his squishy friend was missing. Miss Carioca turned the lights off as she turned her laptop on, checking her emails as the rest of the children watched the video and completely unaware that she was sitting on one of her students. Try as you might, your pathetic struggles were in vain, as the teacher's weight was just too great to cause her to notice anything. Whether you liked it or not, you were just going to have to wait until either she noticed you, or until class was over.


What happens next?

She straitened up when she heard the noise coming in and you were greeted to the sight of the principal. She was a sharp looking woman with her black hair in a tight bun but her features were soft which you could only assume meant she was young. Principal Malory was someone that everyone liked, she just seemed nice but strict as if she was being fair even when she really wasn't. Her hips were wide with a large booty that filled out most chairs and modest sized boobs. Her green eyes were peircing as she smiled through blood red lips "Jack Harper just the... Student I wanted to see." She plopped down into her chair and you could hear it groan under her.

She still had that smile, like a cat that caught the canary You shook you head nervously and for some reason your negative response seemed to please her. I'm afraid that this behavior is unacceptable, I'll have to contact your mother." She started reaching for her phone and your eyes bulged out of your head.

"Well, I did give you the option, consider all of your misconduct forgiven. Oh and if YOU decide to tell your mother I'll be sure it gets added back to the record. I look forward to our time together Jack." She didn't give you time to reneg as she squashed you up into a ball and...

1112.content:
It was definitely your imagination. Like a river breaching a damn, wave after wave of students exploded out of the classroom and began stampeding down the hallway. You barely have a second to think before wayward body parts start knocking you flying. A swinging arm here, a bouncy round rear there and of course the stamping feet. Crushed into the ground by a heavyset girl talking animatedly to her friends then flicked up and splattered on the legs of a sallow skinny boy before being peeled off and tossed again. After what seemed like hours of repeated squishing and stretching the hall was empty and you were pretty sure you'd lost at least a bit of your body mass stuck to parts of the horde.

"Miss Carioca I .. I'm here" you stutter in apprehension as you slink into the room. Only two people are left in the classroom, Miss Carioca with a disapproving frown and Andrew who was scowling. You gulped, you didn't think Andrew might be punished for trying to hold your spot.

112.content:
You dashed as fast as your legs would allow down the staircase, only to be met with a cloud of smoke. The haze of nicotine fumes not only went into your nose but seemed to cling to your gooey body. You cough heavily and rub your arms as if your shivering in a vain attempt to get rid of the sensation.

"Well well, what do we have here?" A monotone voice with a hint of disdain drawled.

Rubbing your eye's, you can make out figures. You gulp as the dyed black hair, piercings and stereotypical clothes of a goth. The smoke should have tipped you off that this was the wrong set of stairs and now you were on some scary turf.

Then again you really didn't know if they were actually mean. Andrew had told you rumors and you usually avoided the area, but rumours weren't alway true were they? Ash had advised you to try to be more assertive but now might not be the best time.
112.title: You're at the wrong staircase.

choices: Stuck between Melissa large boobs
Plastered to Brady shirt
Fasten to Tammy butt below her skirt
1121.content:
"What? Who the fuck invited the kid," a towering teenage goth girl exclaimed startled, as she sprung off the wall, coughing up smoke. She was tall and slightly plump with green dye hair wearing a ton of goth jewelry, a ripped rocker shirt that revealed her massive cleavage spilling out, with black ripped jeans and boots to match. You promptly noticed her hand movement covering the vape pen she held in possession behind her back.

"Ugh! Sorry, I think I took a wrong turn..." You stuttered, saying, slowly walking back to the door, hearing the sound of it closing behind. You spun around racing to twist the doorknob open. Each twist the knob spun, but sadly, the door wouldn't open, and soon girl had you.

"Not so fast, twerp!" the girl responded, gripping your T-shirt collar as she pulled you gummy body promptly with it. The girl settled you against the wall with one hand as she bent over to intimidate you, showing off an even grander view of her jugs. "You're about to go rat us out to the principle, weren't you!" she yelled with such anger that reminded the way your mom would have done the same.

"No, I.." you ended as another voice muttered from the dark.

"Hey, Melissa! Easy up, he's just a kid." A young teenage boy replied, exiting the shadowy end. He looked about close to the height of this girl holding you down from running away, with spikey black hair, slender and dressed in a black hoodie among a red designer T-shirt, and tight pants with sneakers.

"Shut up, Brad! If we didn't rig that door not to open properly, we all be in detention right now," she blurted, releasing her grip of you momentarily to make out with her boyfriend quickly.

You overhear the two smooching, witnessing him grab a handful of her ass, which provided you an excellent chance to run again, as you squeeze past the two. You suddenly were shoved to the ground as a thin tiny girl rested her butt on your back. "Nice one guys, you almost let the little runt getaway," the girl spoke.

"Shut up, Tammy! The little fucker wasn't going get far anyways," Melissa stated, feeling up her boyfriend's chest.

"Whatever, you both said the next one was mine to deal with anyways," she smiled, looking back, which brought chills to run throughout your body. She had bubblegum pink color pigtails, bearing a gothic black blouse and skirt with striped pantyhose underneath with stylish shoes, it all spelled terrible news for you. 133.content:
You give a wave and a “See you guys later” as you break into a sprint, making a beeline for the towering slides that your mother reminded you that you were not allowed to go on. A few steps in, your run is broken as a firm voice pierces the air.

“Now just hold on there young man!”

You feel a large hand grasp your shoulder and yank you back. You find yourself face to face with your annoyed mom as she dangles you above the ground.

“Jack Harper!” she scolds as you struggle to break free from her grip. “You know better than to run off by yourself in a place like this. How many times have you had an accident here? You know the rules: you can ride the slides if me or Aunt Viv or Barbara is with you.”

“Aw, Mom,” you protest. “Do I have to go with one of you? Can’t I at least go with Andrew? He can look after me.”

“I’m sorry, dear,” your mom says. “Andrew just isn’t old enough to watch after you properly. I just don’t trust another kid to make sure nothing happens to you. I would feel a lot better if your sister and you were with an adult.”

You look around to see if at least she would come with you and Andrew on the slides, but he had already taken off. Kat and Kris had left too, but your mom didn’t trust them either. And with Kat constantly pranking you and setting you up for catastrophe, she was right. But you weren’t exactly thrilled to spend your day with your little sister and your mom and her friends either. Selena would surely whine and cry until she got her way, usually at your expense. And all of these women present challenges of their own for you. Barbara is inattentive at best, and at worst has a twisted side. You’ve never been able to prove it, but you’ve always suspected that she looks to squish you for her own amusement. Your Aunt Vivian, while sweet, is dumb as a bag of rocks. On top of that, she likes to drink, further impacting her already questionable judgement. And your mom is in full overprotective mode; if she even lets you on anything bigger than the kiddie slides, she will likely insist on carrying you in her arms (which doesn’t exactly prevent you from being squished most times). While she is smarter than her sister, she does have her ditzy moments. She is good at protecting you from outside forces, but tends to let her guard down when it comes to herself. In spite of - and sometimes because of - her fiercely protective nature, she has squashed you as much as anyone else. You sigh as you are confined to a day with one of these ladies.

1331.content:
Your sister prances around happily on the ground, as you sit annoyed in your mother’s arms. She must have sensed your frustration because she offers up a suggestion to the group:

“I know,” she addresses Barbara and Vivian, “Why don’t you guys take Selena around, and I’ll keep an eye on Jack. This way we can all get to ride more slides, and Jack and I can have some mom-son time.” The others agree, and walk off, leaving you to spend the day with your mom. You wish you could have gone with one of the others, as they would be more open to letting you try some of the bigger rides that are off-limits to you when your mom is around. Trish notices you pouting, and tries her best to cheer you up.

“Jack, sweetie,” she says as she sets you down, “Don’t think we can’t have fun just because I’m your mother. Come on, let’s go get in line. I promise we’ll have a great time.”

The day starts off as expected, with your mom taking you on the smallest slides meant for the youngest kids. You sometimes run into Barbara, Viv and Selena, who’s having a great time, but is still young enough not to know the difference. Before too long, you convince your mom to let you move up a size, and try some of the bigger rides. She reluctantly agrees, but insists on sharing a raft with you. When these rides go off without a hitch, you ask to try the next step up, and, feeling a bit more at ease, agrees again. Your pleading seems to work today, as you have managed to guilt-trip your mother to not sound like a party pooper. She actually managed to be a fun mom today. Not only that, but you have managed to avoid any hazards, aside from being slightly bent out of shape upon hitting the water. Today was shaping up to be a pretty awesome day.

Finally you decide to make your move. You point towards the towering slide overlooking Splash Zone and implore your mother to let you go. “I don’t know, honey,” she says with a tinge of trepidation in her voice. “That one has always scared me when it comes to you. I just don’t feel right letting you go.”

“Come on, Mom,” you beg, putting everything in to getting a “yes” out of her. “Everything’s been fine today. You know I’ll be in the pool when I come down. And you can go right after me. Please? Please”

“Alright,” she concedes, finally giving into your puppy eyes and assurances. “But I’m going to be right behind you.”

You each grab a raft and get in line. At the top, you are overcome with emotions at finally being able to do something normal kids can do. As you set into place, the attendant warns you to hang on, as riders tend to lose their rafts on the way down. With a slight shove, you are sent on your way. The water rushes up to meet you as you rocket through the tunnel at full speed. The incline gives, and you brace for a sheer vertical drop upon impact. Sure enough you feel your raft slip as you hit the water below. The raft floats to the end of the pool as you hit with a splash. That was awesome!

As you bob to the surface, you see your mother waving to you at the top before she sits down into the tunnel. Suddenly a current from the impact hits you and knocks you back towards the slide. You attempt to free yourself but are caught by the water jets along the end of the slide. You hear a rumbling sound above, and look up to see a massive figure barreling down the slide directly towards you. You struggle vainly to swim away, but the jets are too strong.

“Mom, look out!” you call up to her. “Mom! MOOOOM!”

*SPLASH*

Trish touches down at the bottom of the pool. As she stands up, she notices that her raft had become stuck to her rear end, and pulls it off as she steps out of the pool and looks around for you.

“Whew, that sure was fun, and I turned out to be worried about nothing. You were right, Jack, nothing will happen to you, as long as I’m here with you...Jack? Honey? Jack? Honey? Now where did that boy go?” Your mother figures you must have run off on her. While she was worried about you going off on your own, she figured that with the size of this place, she will find you later. Your going down the big slide on your own somewhat assured her you can take care of yourself, and she can have some time to herself taking her raft down the slides. Unfortunately she didn’t notice that she had also lost her own raft going down the slide, and that it had tumbled off by yours. The “raft” she had landed on, and was currently clutching in her powerful grip as she got back in line to use again, was in fact her son.

For the next few hours, you did what you set out to do, and rode every slide in the park. What you didn’t count on was that you would have to do it squashed under the weight of your mom. The afternoon was a blur of being slammed down at the start of the ride, the air being compressed out of your lungs as your mother sits on you, dashing any hopes you have of reforming, carrying her down a path of hot plastic, and cushioning her fall as she once again flattens you on the landing. This goes on for much of the day until....

15.title: Reader’s choice

choices: Trish asks what you want to do.
She’s planned a busy day of activities.

153.content:
After breakfast, you retreat back to your room and, after getting dressed, look out your window. Down below you see Selena climb into her friend’s mom’s minivan. A few minutes later, you see Kat walk out, ready to join her friends downtown. You breathe a sigh of relief as the two people who had the best chance of ruining your day are out of your hair for a good length of time. As you sit on your bed, you begin to ponder how you will spend today. Andrew and his family are out of town, so it looks like it will be up to you to create your own fun. You decide to spend the day catching up on your gaming. Without Selena fighting over the TV, Kat tormenting you, or Andrew holding you back, you might be able to finish off some of your games today. You reach out for the door, ready to step into the hallway, feeling great. You have the house to yourself, except for...

*WHOMP!*

The door snaps open, smashing into you full-force, before swinging back and squashing you against the wall. You then hear the voice of the person responsible.

“Where’s my little angel?”, your mother cheerfully sings as she steps into your room. “Jack? Ja-ack? Where did you go?” After searching your room for a few minutes, she finally notices your feet sticking out from under the door. She pulls it back to find you flattened against the wall.

“There you are, you silly little guy,” she giggles as she reaches to peel you off the wall. “Were you going to jump out and scare your Mommy? Good thing I’m too smart for that!”

As you begin to reform, Trish continues while carrying you over to your bed. “Jack, sweetie, I know it’s been tough adjusting to your sister, and having Kat stay with us hasn’t been easy either. But now that we have the house to ourselves, I was thinking we could have a day of mother-son bonding, just the two of us.”

You are torn as to what to say. On the one hand, it would be nice to not have to share your mom with anyone else for a day. On the other hand, your mom is a walking contradiction for whom you are sometimes grateful she has to divide her attention between multiple kids and a cat. When other people are around or you are out in public, she is a mama bear. But when it’s just you and her, she is an oblivious elephant. The incident with the door just now is a prime example (your mother has never learned to open doors gently - even as an infant, you would find yourself pinned to the wall, sometimes for hours at a time): she often assumes that when it’s just you and her, you are safe, leading her to lose track of where you are. And in her exuberance and absent-mindedness, she can become just as much of a hazard as anyone else. When this happens, she never seems to figure out what went wrong, and assumes that you are either playing a game, or lecturing you that you have to be more careful. And while she sometimes tries to get involved with the things you like (with results ranging from comical to disastrous), other times she comes up with a set of activities or projects involving heavy physical activity, and often end with her clumsiness putting the “bonding” in “mother-son bonding.” Nevertheless, you look up and see the anticipation in your mother’s eyes, and you know the wrong answer would break her heart. Besides, you may not get another chance to spend time with her again for a while.

“Alright, Mom,” you say. “Let’s spend the day together.”

You find yourself squished again as your mom gives you a big hug. “Oh, Jack,” she says, “We’re going to have so much fun today!”
153.title: A “Fun” Day with Mom

choices: Clean the house

1533.content:
“You know, honey,” your mom muses as she holds you in her lap, “there’s just so much that has to get done right now. The house is a mess, and needs to be cleaned top to bottom. Then there are a bunch of errands I have to run. And I’ve been meaning to tackle that big project in the basement, and finally get that workout room completed. I’m sorry, sweetie, but there’s just no time for fun and games today.”

You breathe a sigh of relief. As much as you love your mom, and hate having to compete for her attention, you did not feel like spending an entire day avoiding a mishap from this woman, who in her overly perky, bubbly state, becomes particularly accident-prone. Thankfully, your mom will be too busy working today, so that you can have that nice, relaxing time to yourself that you originally planned on. You do your best to feign disappointment as you react to her news.

“That’s alright, Momma,” you reply, doing your best to hold back any sign of elation in your voice. “We can always do that another time. I know you’re really busy today, and have too much to do. I guess I’ll just stay out of your waaaarrrgh...”

Your face is suddenly stretched like elastic as your mom grabs your cheek and playfully pulls it up and down, rendering you unable to speak. Her next words once again squelch all hopes of you having an easy-going, accident-free day. “And guess what?” she continues, with the same chipper tone as before, “You get to be Mommy’s special little helper for all of it. It’s going to be so much easier if we do it all together.”

Trish lets go of your cheek, letting it snap back at your face like a rubber band, leaving you dizzy, slightly distorted. This was not good. You are once again resigned to spending a day tied to your mother’s apron strings, and she once again placed you directly within the radius of her clumsiness. You try to protest, but are momentarily unable to speak as a result of the cheek-pinching your mom gave you moments ago.

“I know, sweetheart,” Trish says in response to your moaning. “It’s not what you wanted to do today. But time will go by so fast when we do it together. And who knows, maybe we will have some fun. After all, it’s going to be a big, long day of Jack-Mom time.” Before you can say anything else, your mother grips you tightly in her arms and whisks you off for a day that would be boring at best and hazardous to you at the worst.

“Let’s see,” Trish mutters as you struggle to free yourself from her iron grip, “What should we do first?”

"I think so", you answered. "We found a neat looking silver one last year."

"Oh yeah! That one with the big ol' pinchers", Andrew replied excitedly. The two of you loved looking for cool looking bugs. Your backyard wasn't the best place to look for them, since most of it was taken up by the clothesline and the shed where your mother worked on her hobbies (not to mention your sister's toys that she left out). Even with the swimming pool, Andrew's backyard was a lot bigger, and there were also a lot of bushes for bugs to hide in. "Oh come on, Jack!", Andrew pouted. "That big spider only got you because you didn't call for help." 'The spider' incident happened last year when the two of you were looking for bugs. "I can't help it!", you whined. "It's real easy for you to tell me to just call for help, but you've never had a big scary bug munching on you before!"

Andrew sighed, knowing you weren't going to stop arguing until you got him to understand. "Well, look. Stevie and his friends are supposed to be coming over later today, and they'll prolly want to come back here. So we don't have a lot of time to look."

You cringed nervously. Stevie on his own was bad enough. You didn't want to know how bad his friends would be if they got their hands on you. "Yeah... I guess you're right..."

"Okay, great! You take those bushes over in the corner of the fence, and I'll look in the ones by the house. Lemme know if you find anything, okay?", Andrew said.

You focused on reforming, but it was taking longer than you thought. You couldn't hear anyone else, so you figured that Miss Harper must have taken Stevie to preschool and Ash was at school. You were more than a little upset that Miss Harper or Jack didn't call to check on you, but everything seemed to have worked out anyway. More than an hour had passed since your mom left you on the bed, and you hadn't made much progress. You hoped that you weren't stuck like this. Suddenly, your thoughts were interrupted as the bedroom door opened.

"Hey, Barb, I'mma leave my bags in here, kay?" You looked over and saw an unfamiliar woman walk into your mom's room. She was much shorter than your mom, maybe coming up to her chest. Her skin was also a lot darker, and she had red hair that flared out at the sides, looking like the base of her neck was aflame, and her eyes were a deep purple color. While she was a lot shorter, she was just as curvy as your mom. Her breasts were maybe a cup size smaller, but her hips were just as wide as hers, and she had a little bit of pudge on her belly. She was wearing a skintight black dress, a pair of black high heeled boots, a black headband, and a gold necklace with what looked like an emerald at the center. If you had to guess, this must be your Aunt Camilla. Her hips shifted as she walked inside and placed her bags by the closet... before she turned her attention over to you. "Hmm?"

"Oh no!", you thought.

"Now what do we got here?", Aunt Camilla asked aloud as she walked over to you. You mentally panicked as she grabbed ahold of you, her nails digging into your malleable flesh as she squeezed. She held you close to her nose and sniffed. "Smells like banana puddin'..." She looked down at you and smirked. "Barbie told me there were squishie folks here... guess she thought she could have you for herself." Your aunt tossed you up and down a bit, disorienting you as you spun in the air. "Well I don't think she'll mind sharing with her favorite big sis..."

You tried to squeak as loud as you could to get your mom's attention before your aunt did something bad to you.




What happens now?

There was a minor feeling of absorbing some of it but your mouth was already full of foot so it was hard to tell if you had tasted it or not. It seemed as though you weren't going to even get a tiny break but then your realized that instead of the boots, the shoe you were going to be shoved was instead the worn sneakers sitting to the other side of them. Soon enough she was back in her gym cloths and you got to see the inside of the shoe. it was probably white at one point, but it was a dirty brown now and it smelled even worse than her foot had coming out of the boot despite it having been resting all day in the air conditioning. You slid over the insole and found that your intuition wasn't wrong, you were definitely absorbing the sweat from all around and not just the foot in your mouth as the old insole practically squelched it's contents into you. The stale nature of it doing nothing to dull the taste you got perhaps even making it worse. You felt yourself try and gag, but all that did was slightly nudge Barbara's foot to which she giggled. "Calm down, I haven't even started yet."

And just to make it ever so slightly worse Barbara decided to Jog all the way to the gym. You mentally gulped as she walked past the car her feet already unleashing a fresh layer of sweat for you to drink, every step making the insole under you less wet as you absorbed it's old contents. There was a slight pause as she stretched, you could see heat wafting up from the concrete. The first step was on your foot of course slamming down into the pavement to push off, your world rushed around as her legs started pumping and then you were smashed by the next step, like she was stomping as hard as she could on the lower end of your body and then rolling up to your stomach where she pushed off with the ball of her foot. You didn't know what was worse but you were leaning towards the pounding because even after she stopped panting inside the gym there was a lingering pain that radiated as long as she was standing on you. at some point you had started whimpering with each step but she seemed to like that or didn't realize it was happening.

Barbara meanwhile was catching her breath and grinning, she hadn't thought this would work out so well when she got up this morning. Not only did her now squishy son Want to be a sock, he was giving her every reason to think about letting him keep his dream job, he even started licking or something half way through her jog over and he was still doing it whenever she shifted her weight onto him. She briefly considered taking care of or swapping out her other sock to prolong this little game but waved it away. If he hadn't gotten it out of his system by the time she wore out this other sock then he could tell her when time was up, what she could do to make it a bit better for him is simply pretend he wasn't there. Sure she had been talking to him but Trish hadn't even known about him and he had seemed to like that too. She sighed happily as she pressed down on him again feeling his little licks drinking in her sweat.

The rest of the gym trip was just what you'd expect, but you couldn't stop whimpering from the initial cardio and she seemed like she had noticed and was now going out of her way to make it happen. But the actual stomping had taken a break as she dropped off her bag in the locker room, the woman locker room wasn't something you were interested in right at that moment but you were on the lookout for Ms. Trish and Jack who might recognize you, but sadly you didn't see them in fact you didn't know any of the women that surrounded Barbara. The one coming up to her also didn't seem familiar but she seemed to know your mother. Since she was standing still you could even focus on their conversation.

"Well, if my eyes don't deceive. Is that Black Siren Storm I see" The woman was.. athletic looking, wide hips, sporting a six pack and some sizable breasts for someone so athletic but the biggest stand out for her body shape is her thighs look like they could squish a regular person if she just squeezed them too hard. Her hair was black, and her entire body looked exceptionally toned with a light tan but it was clear she was typically very fair skinned. She almost looked like a buff Vampire if she had dressed in darker cloths your eyes of course were drawn down to your eye level where her shoes and socks were. The socks were nearly the same as you, but they were TAN with a little yellow band at the top, and her shoes were practically a perfect match for the ones Barbara was wearing. You didn't know what to make of her.

"I haven't been called that for a good long while, and as I recall you were only a newbie while the Black Sirens were big, Vampthigher." The two women stared at each other glaring but then they both cracked, laughing a bunch before calming themselves down.

"I didn't think you come to this gym, Brandy don't you have your own place?" That was your mother again, so this lady's name was Brandy and she was your mom's friend from wrestling it seemed.

"I don't, well once a month or so but I couldn't help but come say high you just looked so happy I wanted to know what you were celebrating. You haven't even started your workout and you're drenched." She observed.

Barbara beamed though, "Oh it's just this new sock is [b]special[/b] it just feels so great and I can't wait to start." The other woman raised an eyebrow at the singular and looked down at you, here eyes were an almost glowing green and you could swear she was looking you in the eyes with a sour glare that quickly turned into a happy smile.

"You always did find the best stuff Barbie, I can hardly get my crummy socks to last more than a week sometimes." They laughed over the terrifying fate that she had implied.

"well I'm not about to give this up. come on let's work out." She put emphasis by giving you a light stomp causing another series of whimpering licks to wash over her foot. You hadn't even been her sock for half a day and you felt like she was going to break you. The two woman chatted while you couldn't follow thier conversation anymore because of the beating you were taking. At no point though did you stop absorbing her sweat, apparently able to take an infinite amount

you were surprised but happy as you were peeled off of the foot at the end of the workout, still in the womans locker room. You were suddenly brought to the other drenched foot and scrubbed against it taking all the sweat off and then up into her armpits with a more sour taste and into her cleavage. You whimpered lightly but Barbara didn't seem to hear it, although Brandy was looking at her like she had gone mad. She must have seen the look before laughing and tossing you to the muscular woman.

"Feel it and take a sniff." She squeezed you but no moisture escaped only a light whining sound and then she brought you up to her face "Pudding?" Barbara grabbed you back and stuffed you back on her foot.

"Told you it was a great sock." She said simply plopping you back into the worn sneakers wiggling her toes making you whimper. Brandy's eyes were locked on you though. "See you next month?"

Brandy nodded "Yeh, I'll give you a call." And with that they parted ways, leaving you to suffer on the jog back arguably worse than the jog there now that it was after noon. You weren't able to control your whimpering at all, but the sound didn't seem to reach Barbara when she pulled you off again and stuffed you into the dirty gym shoes. She didn't even say anything to you just leaving you to stew in her dirty shoes until tommorrow's workout.

"There's that sound again, oh well, I'm sure Andrew will be back from his summer camp and day now. I wouldn't mind extending it for a while though. I'll just have to ask him when he gets back." She said to 'herself' that was as easy a warning you were going to get to be a good sock until she was done with you. A shiver rand through your gooey form as you remembered the spider again.

"How can meanies like that spider pick on guys like you and me," you asked the caterpillar. "Is it just because they are mean or is it that nice to eat a poor little guy" you wondered.

Despite how mean it was you couldn't help but picture the bug squirming around in your own stomach. Everyone always had an advantage over you even nice people still ended up squishing or gulping you down sometimes. It would be nice to have the power for once.

154224.content:
As you were considering eating the caterpillar, it seemed that the worm had the same idea. Lost in thought, you failed to notice as the caterpillar started slowly munching away at your hand as it crawled up! By the time you realized that your new friend was eating you, it had already devoured you up to your arm, and had gotten quite plump! "E-e-euagh!", you yelped. You turned white as you froze both in terror and in disgust as you felt more of your body get packed into the caterpillar's tiny tummy, experiencing the gross, sticky insides of the bug. Despite promising to call out for help, the only sound you could make was a slight *squeak* as the caterpillar gobbled you up to your shoulder. You tried lifting your remaining arm to brush it away, but it just gave way underneath your weight. Your body sometimes acted weird when you were feeling extreme emotions, and it seemed extreme fear caused your gooey form to go limp. "C-c-c'mon, little guy...", you timidly squeaked. "I-I wasn't really gonna eat you..."

The bug didn't seem to care, continuing to gobble up it's massive meal, managing to get up to your head. You tried crawling your way, but your legs just wouldn't function like you wanted. You tried one last time to cry out for help, but by this point it was too late. You had already been eaten up to your mouth, and now it was going to town on the rest of you.

=========================

An hour had passed, and Andrew had collected a good amount of bugs to show his friend. "Hey, Jack! I think i got all I'm gonna catch today. Don't wanna crowd them, ya know?" Andrew looked around his backyard for his friend, only finding some discarded clothes. "Ugh! Stevie must've left his stuff out here again", the boy groaned as he grabbed the clothes and took them over to his house, but stopped as he noticed a rather large caterpillar, roughly the size of a football, crawling up a tree, struggling to make it up with it's weight. "Wooooah! Jack, where are you?!", Andrew called out for his friend, "Get a load of this! There's this huuuge fat caterpillar here! It must've eaten a whole bush!... Jack?" He looked down at the clothes and then back at the caterpillar, racking his brain trying to figure out what must have happened to you. "Hmmm... Guess he must've gone home", he said, shrugging as he headed inside.

Completely unknown to him, you hadn't even made it out of his backyard. You were currently gurgling and churning within the belly of a brightly colored caterpillar, having filled it up nearly to bursting. They normally had to eat for several days before they could enter their metamorphosis, but you were so filling a meal that it could do it now. Having been reduced to little more than a sentient sludge, you could only gurgle and mentally cry at the cruel hand that fate had dealt you. Maybe you would think twice before considering eating something so small and helpless.

You could feel your body squash and stretch like an accordion as the caterpillar crawled up the tree, your liquid-y form sloshing around as the bug's body wobbled. Finally, the caterpillar reached the top of the tree and you felt your surroundings begin to compress around you and harden. It must have started to make it's chrysalis. You mentally panicked, but there was nothing you could do as the caterpillar's body began to rapidly harden. Once the chrysalis had formed, you felt an extreme burning sensation as everything around you began to melt. You had read about this in science class. When the caterpillar begins it's metamorphosis, it doesn't just grow legs and wings: It digests itself! You mentally cried out in pain as you felt the enzymes try to break you down and mix you with the goopy caterpillar. You had survived many unfortunate incidents, but even you couldn't be sure if you'd make it out of this...

1542242.content:
You felt repulsed as your liquid-y body was mixed in with the goopy form of the caterpillar. As the caterpillar's body began to restructure itself, you could feel parts of your own body being forced into different places. It was uncomfortable feeling your body shifting around without your control, and even moreso when you didn't know what was going on. For several long days, your body was shifted and contorted as you tried desperately to escape the chrysalis. You felt parts of your body harden and a tingling feeling along your back. Your body was clearly changing, and you did not like it one bit. Finally, after what felt like an eternity, you mustered the strength to burst out of your prison, tearing through the membrane and letting out a gasp, getting your first breath of fresh air in over a week.

Immediately, you noticed that you were considerably smaller, maybe only a couple of inches. You panicked and looked all over your body. Some sort of flesh-colored hard, exoskeleton had formed over your body aside from your head and chest, giving you an almost armored appearance (though you were still quite fragile). You still retained only a single pair of arms and legs and a full head of black hair. The biggest change was going on in your back, which now sported a pair of (comparatively) large black butterfly wings with yellow stripes and blue spots. You flexed your back and found that you could flap them back and forth. You began hyperventilating as you sat down and tried to take this in. "I... I'm... What am I?!", you cried out to no one in particular. "Am I some kind of bug? Am I a fairy?!" Your eyes began to water as you realized that your short life, as you knew it anyway, was over. "I can't believe it...", you sulked to yourself. "I got ate by a caterpillar and turned into a fairy. What am I gonna do? What's momma gonna say when she sees me like this?" You thought about how your mother would react. She would be even more overprotective than ever before, refusing to let you out of her sight for a second. You wouldn't even get to play with Andrew anymore or go to school, denying you a chance to talk to the girl you had a crush on. Even worse than that, Selena would probably take over your room!

As you sat there feeling sorry for yourself, you failed to notice a shadow looming over you. Before you got the chance to see, you were suddenly enveloped inside of a white butterfly net and flung back.




Who's caught the newly-formed fairy boy?
1542242.title: Jack the Fairy

You gasped as you saw the creepy grin of your now-gigantic little sister staring down at you as she reached into the net and grabbed you, holding you up to her face. "Oh my gosh!!!", she squealed with joy. "I found a fairy! A real life fairy!" The wind was squeezed out of you as she tightened her grip and spun around with you as she laughed. "I got a fairy~ I got a fairy~ ", she sung as you were made dizzy by Selena's dancing. Even as she stopped to run into her own backyard, your world continued to spin. The little girl ran toward her pet kitty, Ian, who was lying in the sun napping. "Look, Ian!", Selena squealed as she presented you to her cat. "I found my very own fairy!" The chubby black kitty yawned before rolling over on his belly and sniffing you. You panicked and squirmed in your sister's grip as you saw Ian begin to lick his lips and opened his mouth wide before you were yanked away, his jaws closing with a *SNAP*! "Ian, no! Bad kitty!", Selena snapped, with Ian giving a disappointed "mew".

"Fairies aren't for eating, silly kitty", she said as she looked down.

You took this chance to try and get her attention. "Selena! I'm not a fairy!", you called out. "It's me, Jack!"

Selena's eyes widened as she heard your high pitched voice squeak out to her. "You can talk!", she exclaimed. "Ohmigosh! I gotta show Mommy!" It seemed that she either couldn't understand you or she was so excited that she wasn't paying attention to what you were actually saying as she quickly ran inside the house, with her precious pet kitty following close behind her. "Maybe mommy can help find the rest of the fairies... the fairy kingdom... and I can bring Natalie and we can both be fairy princesses... I can be a double princess!" Selena continued daydreaming out loud while a glimmer of hope began to shine though your fear. If your mom found you, she might be able to figure out a way to help you return to normal, or at the very least, you'd be safer with her than with your little sister and her chubby kitty cat. Selena ran into the living room where your mother was on the phone with Barbara, calling to see if she had heard anything about you. It had been several days since you had seemingly vanished without a trace, and she was incredibly worried. You usually resurfaced after a day or two if anything happened, but it had been almost two weeks since you had been eaten by the caterpillar. Trish was worried that her little boy might never return to her. As she continued with her call, Selena walked in screaming. "MOOOMMMYYY!!!"

Trish jumped up and screamed in shock at the sudden outburst of her daughter. "S-sorry, Barb, I'll have to call you back!" She hung up the phone and ran over to Selena, thinking that something bad had happened. "What is it, sweetie?", she asked as she knelt down. "What's the matter?"

"I found a fairy, mommy!", Selena exclaimed, barely able to contain her excitement.

Trish sighed in relief. She was already worrying her head off over losing her son. Knowing that her daughter was at least still perfectly fine. "Oh is that right?", she asked with a smile on her face. She didn't actually believe that Selena had actually found a fairy, but she didn't want to make her loose her sense of wonder so soon.

"Yepyep!" Your sister nodded excitedly. "I found it in Miss Barbara's backyard! Look at it, Mommy!" She held you up to your mother's face, giving her a good look.

Trish looked down at the little thing her daughter was holding. If you were going to get rescued from your sister, this was probably your only chance.

154224221.content:
“Look, Mommy, look! A fairy! A fairy!” You hang on for dear life as Selena jumps up and down in excitement, practically shoving the “fairy” into her mother’s face, nearly ramming you into her nose.

Trish gives a sigh, not particularly in the mood to play games, but willing to humor her daughter for the moment. “Okay, honey, calm down”, she replies, bending down expecting to see a butterfly or a doll in Selena’s hand, and prepared to play along. “Oh my,” she says feigning a gasp of surprise. “You certainly did find a lovely little...JACK?!?”

Your eyes light up, overcome with relief that your mom recognized you. You wave your arms frantically in recognition. “Hi, Mom!” you shout, though at your new size, your voice comes out as a tiny squeak.

“Oh, Jack”, your mom sobs, her Mount Rushmore-sized face welling up with tears, “I thought I lost you forever. “What happened?”

“Oh, Mom, it was awful,” you begin. I was eaten by a caterpillar, then I got these wings, and then I...*urk!*

Your story - and your air supply - is suddenly cut off as your mother’s fist closes around your body. You are suddenly lifted upwards just in time to see an enormous pair of lips zoom in to repeatedly crash into your face. For Trish, this is a touching reunion with her child. But for you, it is a hellish torture of loud, wet, dizzying smooches and being stuck in a grip with the force of five anacondas. Finally, she clutched you to her chest in what she would call a tender hug, but you might call a suffocating death press. “Oh, my baby,” she whispers gently, completely oblivious to the fact that her hug is anything but, “Momma’s here. It’s alright now.”

Meanwhile, Selena still hadn’t lost her one-track mind. She begins looking around for her newly-acquired prize. “Mommy,” she asks, “Have you seen where my fairy went?”

As Selena looks up at her mom clutching tightly to an unknown object, Trish shifts her hand so that the top of your head is now visible through her fingers. “He’s right here, honey,” she replies, not registering exactly what her daughter had asked. She finally releases her grip, and you lay in her hand, flattened, dripping with sweat, and gasping for air. After a few minutes, you begin to reform, and decide to show off your new appendages. With a little effort, you get your wings working, and levitate up to your mom’s face, catching her by surprise. “Look, Mom!” you cry excitedly. “Look what I can do!” You circle around the air a few times, before once again coming to rest in her hand. “I guess this experience gave me something good, huh?”

“Oh, Jack, how wonderful!” Trish exclaims. “My little boy can fly!” She claps her hands in excitement...forgetting that she was holding you in her palm. She looks down at the tiny pancake in her hand that is her son. “Oh, silly Mommy,” she chuckles. “Did she hurt her little Jackie?”

“Yes! She did!” you yell once you reform. “Remember that I’m only....mmf!” You once again find yourself pressed into the vice between your mother’s hand and her bosom as she lovingly but cluelessly squeezes you into oblivion. “Don’t worry, sweetheart,” she comforts you. “There’s no better fix for an owie than a mother’s hug.”

After another prolonged period of being mashed into your mom’s crushing embrace, she finally pries you loose. “There now,” she smiles down at you. “Don’t you feel better now?”

“No!” you protest. “You have to stop doing that. It’s hot in there, and...mmf!”

“Aw, you poor thing,” your mom says as she presses you into her flesh prison for a third time. “You need a big, long cuddle.” Just as you are about to pass out from the heat and lack of oxygen, she opens her hand, again leaving you crumpled and panting. “How’s my little angel now?” she asks. All better?”

“No...I mean YES! Yes, all better now! No need to hug me again!” Thankfully, Trish understands your pleas, and you avoid being squashed by your mom for the fifth time in the last five minutes. Trish finally starts to calm down. “Honey, you’ve been through a lot,” she warmly points out. “Let’s get you settled back home.”

“Mommy,” Selena whines, “What about my fairy?”

“Not now, honey,” Trish answers as she walks down the hall. “We’ll look for him later.” She turns her full attention to you. “Now, Jack, let’s...”
154224221.title: The BIG Momma

choices: She turns and sits on top of you!
She drops you into one of her socks...
She hands you over to Ian. Oh NO!
The doorbell rings before she can punish you.
Your mom comes in to see why Selena's making so much noise.
154224222.content:
"MOM!", you screamed. "It's me! Jack!" If you didn't get noticed now, you were a goner. You didn't want to spend the rest of your life as another one of your dumb little sister's pets!

Unfortunately, your cries would fall on deaf ears, almost literally. Although you had no way of knowing, your high-pitched voice was almost inaudible, only coming out as a slight squeaking noise. Your mom looked down at you and smiled. "It's certainly a cute little fairy", she said, playing along with her daughter.

You wanted to cry just then. Even being thrust right in her face and screaming as loud as you could, your mother simply didn't recognize you as her son. It looked like your sister was going to get to keep her fairy after all. You didn't have time to sulk as you were jerked away quickly as Selena ran over to her room. She quickly opened the door and you were greeted with several sickening shades of pink and magenta. Her floor had several fashion dolls and plush toys scattered about along with a few of Ian's cat toys... and your Arcee figure that you thought you lost. Beside her own bed was a small expensive bed that your mom had bought for Ian to sleep in, along with the box it came in which was where he actually slept. On top of her toy box was a large purple and white barbie castle and a bag of weird-looking candy. "Welcome to your new home, Mister Fairy", Selena giggled as she held you out to look at her room.

"It's disgusting!", you whined. "Let me go, you little brat! Take me back to mom!"

"Did you hear that Ian?", Selena asked as she crouched down to her kitty. "He loves it!" The kitty stared up at his owner and let out a "mew" before sticking his tongue out, attempting to lick you! You briefly panicked before your sister pulled you back. "Ian! What did I tell you about my fairy?" Ian held his head down and let out a disappointed "mew.." in response. "Fairies aren't for eating, silly kitty. You're gonna have to be nice to Mister Fairy, or no fishy treats for you, mister." Ian mewed as he squeezed his fat butt into his expensive box and went to sleep as your sister set you down beside her barbie castle. Being stuck with Selena may not be favorable, but at least it looked like she would protect you. You see how much she pampers her other pet. Maybe this wouldn't be as bad as you thought... "Okay, Mister Fairy", she said. "This is gonna be your new castle. Now fly up and look around!" You looked up at the plastic castle that was to be your new home and began to walk in before your sister put her hand in front of the door. "No, don't walk. I wanna see you fly."

"Are you kidding?", you called up as you tugged on your wings. "I barely got these things. I don't even know if they work."

Selena looked more angry as you stood there. " I know you can understand me! I wanna see you fly, now FLY!", she commanded, stomping on the ground.

You were more worried as she glared down at you. "I-I can't! I don't know how!"

"I said I wanna see you fly!", she screamed, stomping her feet. "If you don't do what I say, then I'm gonna have to punish you!" This wasn't good at all. Selena's temper tantrums were always bad news for you when you were normal size. Now, you were the size of a butterfly. Without even a second thought, your little sister could crush you like... well, a bug. You decided to try your best to get your wings working to save yourself from her wrath, but they simply weren't moving. "Hmph! I guess you don't leave me any choice", she said as she wrapped her fingers around you. "This is what happens to fairies that don't listen to their princess!"

You panicked and screamed out for help to save you from your gigantic little sister, but it was no use.
What punishment does Selena have in store for you?
154224222.title: Not-so-Caring Owner

choices: You remain stuck to her panties.
She finds you reduced to a splatter.
1542242221.content:
As your sister carried you over and placed you down on the floor, you were confused at first. Was she letting you go? That thought quickly left your head as you saw her flip up the denim skirt she was wearing, revealing her light blue panties. She was about to sit on you! You let out a scream just before Selena dropped her round squishy rump right on top of you! Your new exoskeleton briefly managed to protect you from being squashed, but the weight of your sister proved to be too great, your outer shell cracking as you splattered underneath her massive rear! Your little sister giggled as she ground her rump on top of her tiny fairy cushion. "Let this be a lesson to you, Mister Fairy", Selena said, grinning as she looked down at her butt. "Never disobey your princess!"

Your groans were muffled beneath the fabric of your sister's panties and tons of buttflesh. You were given a moment of relief as Selena put her hands on the floor and lifted her butt up before dropping it back down, repeating over and over again and giggling wickedly as she pounded her fairy into pulp. Soon, she would stop, deciding to rest as she turned her tv on to watch OK KO while still seated on top of you. "I'm gonna see if you feel like flying after my show's over", Selena said as she wriggled her rump.

You tried as best as you could, but in your current state, there was no way you could budge while your sister's colossal caboose was crushing you. You could barely make out the sounds of the show as Ian crawled into your sister's lap, further increasing the weight put on top of you. Your cries of discomfort were muffled to silence by the tons of assflesh for almost half an hour before she decided to get up to check on her fairy...
1542242221.title: Squash the Fairy!

choices: He catches you. You're cat food, now.
He overshoots the jump and slips, squashing you under his butt.
You manage to lose him.
1542242223.content:
Selena pinched your wings together and lifted you up, bringing you up to her face as she scowled at you. You trembled in fear of your gigantic little sister, afraid of what punishment she had in store for you. Suddenly, an evil grin creeped across her face. "Oh Iannn...~", she said as she looked down at her precious pet kitty as he lied in the box beside her bed.

You gasped as the cat looked up at his owner. "Y-you wouldn't!", you cried. "L-lemme go! I'll try to fly again! Just don't feed me to him!"

Ian briefly opened his eyes wide as he saw his fairy snack struggling in his owner's hand and licked his chops. You screamed and flailed around as Ian wriggled his big furry butt as he squeezed out of his expensive box before flopping on the floor. "Mew."

Selena giggled wickedly as she dangled you over her pet. "You should've listened to me when you had the chance!", she cackled. "Fairies that don't listen to their princess become lunch for her mighty manticore!"

"Mew" Although Ian was by no means mighty, he was still a clever kitty, and was able to gobble you up when you were full size. Currently at the size of a butterfly, you were completely at his mercy. The cat squeezed out of the box as Selena lowered you down to her precious pet's face, opening his mouth wide to await his snack. You flailed around as you looked down at the hungry maw, desperate to avoid falling into the fang-filled pit. Your sister then let go, allowing you to fall to your doom. You screamed and panicked as you flailed in the air, and managed to change your trajectory and bounce off of his nose and to the side of him as he snapped his jaws shut!

"I-I made it!" Your celebration was shortlived as Ian growled angrily at you and raised his paw. You yelped as you jumped to the left, managing to dodge as he slammed his paw into the ground! You weren't safe just yet. Knowing you were in danger if you stayed still, you ran as fast as you could, slipping out from underneath the door and away from the massive hungry cat.

"Go catch him, kitty!", Selena called out as she opened the door. "Go get the fairy!" Ian growled as he ran out, refusing to let his meal get away.

You briefly looked back and saw the giant black cat chasing you down. "L-let me go, you big fat furball!", you yell as you move your tiny legs. "I know you can hear me!"

"MREOWR!" Ian continued sprinting after his prey until he had chased you into the living room. There was a flap that was meant to let him come in and out, but he had grown too fat to freely get out of it without some struggling. If he allowed you to leave now, then he might never get to see what a fairy tasted like. Not intending to let you leave, he suddenly pounced forward, trying to close the distance between himself and his fairy snack.


Does he make it?

Privates(CV)

Sarah come to get you guys for pizza and some how you end up squished by her
