155.content:
You sat on the couch, playing Nintendo switch, both hands on the controller facing the television, holding the house phone against your ear chatting to Andrew. "Are you almost here? I'm dying to start Jedi Fallen Order," you complained, unsettled for the fact you're currently losing a match of Splatoon again, then Andrew's tardiness. You threw the controller to the floor, continuing to chat with your best friend.

"Yeah, I'm bringing it with my Xbox one! My mom told me we're almost there. She all dressed up and excited to be going out with your mom for the night. Honestly, it's scaring me a little." Andrew talked, whispering the last bit about his mother, so she didn't hear the comment, "Oh, by the way! If your mom and my mom are going out, does that mean we're going to be home alone?" Andrew said, excitedly.

"I wish!" you answered, staring out the window into the dark street, after moving the curtains. "Selena went begging to my mom for her friend's older sister to babysit us for the entire night sleepover," you stated, sitting down with disappointment not seeing Barbara's car arrive still. "Lucky for us, they haven't shown up either. So hopefully, you'll get here before that happens,"

"Jack, will you come here please," Trish asked out.

"I got to go! I'll see you soon," you replied, hanging up the call, and went towards the kitchen. "Yeah... MOM!" you responded, surprised before speechless after witnessing your mother, Trish. She had her hair tied in a low twisted bun, wearing a Red Satin V Neckline slit side dress with silver heels, exposing an ample view from front to back, and more importantly, she was wearing makeup that you frequently never seen. "Mom, What the hell are you wearing!" you yelled out, covering your eyes.

"Jack, language young man," Trish pouted, before returning to fix in her earings in a mirror. "I know its a bit much, but Barbara fancied me to wear it out tonight. Anyways, I'm leaving the babysitter a hundred dollars on the fridge with me and Barbara number on a note pad. I don't want to find out that anything unfortunate happens while I'm out till tomorrow morning," Trish stated, still arranging herself when the doorbell rang. "Can you get that sweetie," Trish smiled, in a rush thinking Barbara arrived.

You rushed to the door, ready to start the new game with your bud, "Finally! We can set it...up.." losing your train of thought, as at the door was your dream girl standing there in bright pink frilly pajamas with a sleeping bag and backpack.

"Oh, it's you! That weird boy with a funny condition? Jack, right? I thought this was Selena's house," she claimed, looking past you to see if your sister was inside. "Sorry, I'll go tell my mom that..."

"No!" you blurt out, "She's here! That's my little sister!" You responded nervously. "SELENA!" you cried out, hearing the tumbling of running footsteps at the stairs.

"Mary, you're here!" Selena came crashing downward, almost splattering herself in the process. She was wearing a very long paw patrol shirt that concealed over her panties, leaving only a small bit of her legs and matching socks to view. "I'm so glad you made it, Nat hasn't arrived but come upstairs," Selena took Mary by the arm as they ran up to her room.

Your jaw dropped, unbelieving that your dream girl was spending the night in your household, as for how Selena and Mary knew each other that a mystery. You proceed to close the door when a foot stops it from shutting, "Hey, what the big idea!" a boyish tone voice spoke, pushing the door back open, almost squishing you, "I'm Mary's brother Gary! My mom told made me I had to come with my butthead sister," he announced, nose dripping with snot, and smelly unwashed clothes, "Aw, cool you got a switch. Let's have a turn," he threw his belongings on the couch, turning on the console anew.

You didn't say much to the snotty boy while closing the door, but you perceived he was going to ruin your planned out night with Andrew. Before you took two steps away, the doorbell went off a second time, letting out an earing sigh, proceeding to open it once more.

"Hello," a teen girl smiled as she stood there staring at you. She was tall with a white complexion and green eyes, brunette hair with blond highlights, she had on a pair of black leggings and white designer T-shirt. "My name Sarah, little guy, what's yours?" she expressed friendly, bending over to your eye level.

"My names..." *SQUELCHH*

"Move your butt, Sarah!" Natalie whined loudly, shoving her older sister posterior forwarded, knocking her over in the process to get inside faster to see Selena, and drowning out your audible demise. Unaware that she force a hand in squishing you by Sarah, not that she cares, wearing a lite blue top with pink shorts. "Selena! I'm here," Nat sung, to call her friend, as her sister rose.

Selena came running faster than before, similar to a trained dog, as the two girls hugged each other. "Sarah! I'm so glad your babysitting too," Selena came over to embrace her. As the two girls went back upstairs, you heard the clicking of your mom's heels approach.

"Hi, sorry, I'm in a bit of a hurry! I left some money to order pizza's and my number on the fridge with my friends. If you could drop some of my family laundries in the washer, you'd be an angel! Also, please make sure to keep close on Jack and Selena. I know you've dealt with Selena, but Jack can be just a hand full," Trish rambled on with giggles in between.

Sarah dropped all train of thought after Trish said, "Hi," she was mesmerizingly lost by the sheer beauty Trish doll herself up for the night. A guilty pleasure to Sarah, as she had a massive thing for attractive older women if her rosy cheeks didn't already give that away. Trish finished speaking her endless list of rules, asking if Sarah had any questions, but she was a bubbling mess.

Barbara walked up to the door inviting open door, wear a similar outfit to Trish, only draped in color of dark blue, seeming twice as sexual then Trish. "Knock! Knock! is my date ready," Barbara commented, propelling Sarah's face to grow redder by the second ready to faint. "Be good, sweetie," Barbara kissed Andrew goodbye.

"Would you stop that girl seem embarrassed by what you said?" Trish responded, walking with Barbara down the path, shouting goodbyes to her kids.

"I don't think that was an embarrassment, Trish?" Barbara laughed to her clueless friend.

Andrew saw the boy that wasn't you playing the Nintendo switch, "Excess me, miss?" Andrew asked the babysitter.

"You can call me Sarah to make it easier," she blushed, pretending to scratch her head as she shut the door. She was worried to all hell since she only babysat her sister and not five other kids.

"Sarah, have you seen Jack?" Andrew politely asked, watch Sarah freak already losing a child. "I think that'shim stuck to your shirt?" Andrew added on peeling you free from the girl's breasts. Sarah was shocked and pretty amazed watching you pop back to normal, she kind of wanted to know what it might feel like when happening.

"Come on, Andrew, I have a tv in my room," you affirm, leaving Gary and Sarah downstairs to their business. passing your sister's room, you heard the giggling of the girls, before shutting your door, as Andrew practically stomped on a few of your transformers to set up his Xbox. "So, you won't believe these! but that girl I like is right in the other room," you told Andrew.

"So that kid downstairs is her brother?" Andrew questioned, to which you replied by a nod of your head.

"So go talk to her! Ask to play truth or dare?" Andrew laughed.

Jack listed to girls laughing louder, "No way! I'm too scared. Let's start playing Fallen order as we plan too," Jack said, sitting down next to Andrew. As the night began to get fun later on suddenly...
155.title: Babysitting Slumber Party

info.brief_description: A boy with an unusual condition and struggles to make it through the day. Will he survive?
info.description:
[note: i have visual references for all of these characters here: https://sta.sh/218uo7tesn0s]

You are nine year-old Jack Harper. You were born with a squishy, goo-like body. While this makes you practically immortal, it also means you are extremely weak, constantly getting squashed and flattened by almost everything. You seem to be able to take an awful lot of punishment. Getting smooshed doesn't really hurt you. In fact, you could be melted into a puddle and still be fine. You still hate it nonetheless. You're kind of a geek, often studying on the internet and playing video games. You seem to have stopped aging.
Although you are unusual compared to other people, you're just one of many abnormalities in this world.

Andrew Morrison - 8. Your annoying best friend and next door neighbor. While he’s mostly really nice to you, he’s been known to occasionally mess with you (though he usually knows when to stop). You often play together, catching bugs or with your toys or video games. Even though you can trust him to look out for you, his other friends aren’t always as nice. He sometimes pressures you into doing things you aren’t comfortable with.
He's sometimes a bit impulsive, often failing to consider the consequences before he acts.
Andrew is often the target of Ian, who's bite causes him to become just as squishy as Jack. He doesn't have nearly as much experience in this state, and has trouble reforming if he gets squished. This is especially troublesome when he's around his mom or his little brother.


Trish Harper - 41. Your mother. You have a weird relationship with her. Even though you love your mother and view her presence as a sanctuary from the misfortunes that could befall you, you still finds her overprotective nature and motherly ignorance when it comes to games and stuff more than a little annoying. Even so, you tend to freak out if you aren’t able to find her, despite how much she embarrasses you. She’s a bit shorter than average women, and she’s quite curvy, and she has blonde hair, green eyes, and the same dark skin color as you (though it doesn’t have the same pink tint to it), and sometimes smells of butterscotch.
Unknown to you, Trish has the same condition as yourself and is just as vulnerable as you are when she isn’t taking her medication.

Selena Harper - 6. Your little sister. Your mother adopted her several months ago, and to say you don't get along with her is an understatement. You haven't been able to stand a minute of her living with you, but you try your best to be nice to her since it upsets your mother when you leave her out. Since she's younger, she often gets her way when deciding on movies to watch or restaurants to visit, which wouldn't bother you if she didn't rub it in your face. It doesn't help that she points out the fact that she's taller than you.
Although your mother has been trying to break her of her habits, she's quite masochistic, often forcing herself down people's throats, though most of the kids in your school and your family think she's too creepy, preferring to munch on you instead. Because of this, she's had trouble making friends at school, but having her kitty with her seems to be helping her. She has the same condition that you and your mother have.

Ian- Selena's precious, spoiled pet kitty is an enigma, and a dangerous living weapon. He loves getting pampered by his "mama" and dressed in cute outfits, and rarely ever leaves her side. What makes this kitty different than most is not only because of his malleable body, but his ability to turn others into squishies by biting into them! Once his saliva enters the bloodstream, whoever is bitten remains vulnerable for 24 hours. You swear you've heard him talk, but no one believes you.
He has a habit of getting into your room and knocking your displays over.

Katrina "Kat" Harper - 13. Your tomboyish older cousin who lives in a rural area on the other side of town. She’s been staying the weekend with you and your mom and you haven’t been able to stand one second. She finds your condition hilarious and has been bullying you for as long as you can remember. You’ve spent a lot of her visits squished under her butt or being involved in some kind of awful prank.

Kristopher "Kris" Harper - 15. Your feminine cousin and Kat's older brother. Kris is almost the polar opposite of his sister. While she's always been more boyish and mean, Kris has always been somewhat nice to you and is more girlish in appearance. Although he's more kind than Kat, that doesn't mean you're exactly safe around him, as he does mess with you from time to time. He's always had a fascination with science and chemistry and is usually holed up in his room or the basement, so he rarely if ever visits, though you usually see him at school.
He's aware that your mother shares your condition, but he keeps that info to himself.

Vivian Harper - 35. Your absent-minded aunt. Even though she's your mom's younger sister, she's always been closer with Barbara for as long as you remember. She's somehow even less mature than both of your cousins; happily enjoying the privileges that come with adulthood, while sometimes flat out refusing to take on the responsibilities that come with it. The only reason Kat and Kris have lived long and healthy enough as they have is because your mother and grandmother have been helping raise them. She still loves her children, she just isn't mature or smart enough to properly care for them.
This unfortunately extends to you, as you rarely come back from one of your visits over there without getting smushed by her.


Barbara Morrison - 40. Andrew's mother and an old friend of your mother. You’ve always had a secret crush on her since forever, even if she does squish you every now and then, and only occasionally apologizes. She’s always had a gift for avoiding everyone’s anger and disdain, and even you can’t bring yourself to get mad at her, no matter what she does to you. Even your mother goes along with her without hesitating. She has a much more athletic build than your mother and is about a head taller than she is.
Barbara’s gift for manipulating everyone’s emotions is due to a secret part of her that she’s been hiding from everyone...


Stephan "Stevie" Morrison - 4. Andrew's bratty little brother. Where most people would see a cute, pudgy, innocent little boy, you see sadistic monster. It’s not that Stevie is mean. He’s actually really nice (unless someone tells him no). He just doesn’t see you as a person: just a squishy, yummy toy that can talk. The worst part is he’s smart for his age. He knows just how to hide you so he can keep from getting into trouble.


Ashley "Ash" Parker - 15. Andrew's cousin. You had a pretty horrible encounter with him one Halloween, but he made things right soon after. He seems pretty cool to you, but you still aren't sure of what to think of him, though you feel like you might have something of a crush. He often babysits his cousins and normally tags along with them and Barbara when they go out. He's moderately popular at school, and he's friends with your cousin, Kris.
As his own parents are seemingly never around, he's been living with his aunt and cousins.


Marilynn “Mary” Evans - 8. A kind little girl who is destined to become your soulmate. Although she doesn't share the same interests as you, her cute appearance and kind nature make you look past that, convincing you to come around to try out things she might like. In the future, you will both mean the world to each other and eventually start a family.
There are multiple ways to meet her, and fate has a way of bringing you two together... even if it is through unfortunate circumstances.


Kentwolf created a followup story following up on these characters five years later here: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1975029-A-Squishy-Teen

If you like this story, you should check out their stuff.

=============================================

No one sentence chapters. If it's a bridge chapter, that's understandable, but try to limit them.

Jack can't die, so don't do it.

Use proper spelling and punctuation. Make it is readable. (apparently this part needs attention)

Just about anything else goes. (read below)

No copying other people's work. I can't in good faith have plagiarized work here.

There are several short stories I wrote about Jack. When adding chapters, you can choose to incorporate them into the interactive if you'd like, unless they're "Bad End" stories.

If a there's a sudden development that doesn't make any damn sense, or if a chapter is nothing but a sentence long, I will delete the chapter without hesitation. HOWEVER if it's clear that some effort is put into it, I'll simply email you before going over and fixing grammatical or continuity errors.

Gas/Toilet stuff is alright so long as it's not too heavy.

[edit 11/16/19]: There might be instances in which other characters are turned squishy, in which case you're free to switch the POV to them for a bit. When you do so, be sure to label the chapter with the squishie we're following.
[edit 11/26/19]: Anyone that happens to get bitten by Ian will temporarily become a squishie like Jack or Trish and have the same properties. This could last anywhere between one day and one week. Whoever is bitten should be extra careful: If they don't reform to their original state whenever the effects of the bite wear off, they will remain in whatever form they are currently in for good. Should they get flattened, their new default form will simply be a soft fleshy pancake (thought they'll be able to stretch as long as their original form was tall). If they are eaten, then they will remain as a sentient layer of fat for the rest of their existence. If they are melted, then they will remain a liquid.

================================================================
I'm open to suggestions for chapters if you aren't confident in your own writing ability.
